C:\xerces-1_4_4>java sax.SAXCount -Nsv data\personal-schema.xml

The following are the error messages I get.

What am I doing wrong??? Am I using the wrong options?
I want to perform XML Schema validation of the personal-schema.xml file.

Please advice.
Thanks...

You are turning off namespaces!!
sax.SAXCount -Nsv 

Namespaces must be on to validate against XML Schemas.
creator: elena@apache.org

text:

creator: ama@fgm.com

text:
This kind of questions should be posted to xerces-j-users list.
There is an older vs of xerces in your classpath (xerces you are trying to run 
should be the first xerces.jar in the classpath). To check the version of the 
parser you are trying to run:
java org.apache.xerces.framework.Version
creator: elena@apache.org
ama@fgm.com
text:
Ok,

Here it is.

C:\xerces-1_4_4>java org.apache.xerces.framework.Version
Xerces 1.4.4

Is running the Xerces 1.4.4 version.

Am I missing some classes? Do you get the same errors on your system?

Thanks for your prompt response.

creator: ama@fgm.com
text:
I finally figured out what was wrong.

I had some "Third" party jar files in my classpath which was causing the 
conflict.


Thanks for the help.....
